body_html:
You should just be able to run something like this:

$ bazel test //tensorflow/compiler/xla/...

I don't think there's an explicit test_suite for those tests but you can just use the ... pattern to test everything in a subdirectory.
body_text:
You should just be able to run something like this:
$ bazel test //tensorflow/compiler/xla/...

I don't think there's an explicit test_suite for those tests but you can just use the ... pattern to test everything in a subdirectory.
body:
You should just be able to run something like this:

```
$ bazel test //tensorflow/compiler/xla/...
```

I don't think there's an explicit `test_suite` for those tests but you can just use the `...` pattern to test everything in a subdirectory.
